Package com.otabi.jcodroneedu.protocol

Interface Serializable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ack, Address, Altitude, Attitude, Bias, Button, Buzzer, CardClassify, CardColor, CardFunctionList, CardList, CardRange, CardRaw, Color, Command, CommandLightEvent, CommandLightEventColor, CommandLightEventColors, Count, DisplayClear, DisplayClearAll, DisplayDrawCircle, DisplayDrawLine, DisplayDrawPoint, DisplayDrawRect, DisplayDrawString, DisplayInvert, Error, Flow, Header, Information, InformationAssembledForController, InformationAssembledForEntry, Joystick, JoystickBlock, LightDefault, LightEvent, LightManual, LightMode, LightModeColor, LightModeController, LightModeDrone, Message, MonitorType, Motion, Pairing, Ping, Position, Position, Position16, Quad8, Quad8AndRequestData, Range, RawFlow, RawMotion, Registration, Request, Request, RequestOption, Rssi, State, SystemInformation, Trim, UpdateLocation, Version, Weight
public interface Serializable
Defines the contract for all protocol message objects. Any object that can be sent or received must implement this interface.

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      byte getSize()
      Gets the size of the object's payload when packed.
      Returns:
      The size of the payload in bytes.

    • pack

      void pack(ByteBuffer buffer)
      Packs the object's fields into a ByteBuffer for transmission.
      Parameters:
      buffer - The ByteBuffer to pack data into.

    • unpack

      void unpack(ByteBuffer buffer) throws InvalidDataSizeException
      Unpacks data from a ByteBuffer to populate the object's fields.
      Parameters:
      buffer - The ByteBuffer to unpack data from.
      Throws:
      InvalidDataSizeException - if the buffer has insufficient data.

    • parse

      default void parse(ByteBuffer buffer) throws InvalidDataSizeException
      A default helper method that provides a standard entry point for parsing. This allows the Receiver to be completely decoupled from the unpack implementation.
      Parameters:
      buffer - The ByteBuffer containing the payload to parse.
      Throws:
      InvalidDataSizeException - if the buffer has insufficient data.

    • toArray

      default byte[] toArray()
